title: Data Scientist & ML Engineer
summary: Data Science graduate from the University of Bath with strong foundations in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data engineering. Experienced in building end-to-end ML pipelines, developing predictive models, and deriving actionable insights from complex datasets. Proficient in Python, R, and modern ML frameworks with a passion for solving real-world problems through data-driven approaches.

experience.title: Data Science Researcher
experience.description: Conducted advanced research in machine learning and statistical modeling as part of Master's dissertation.
highlights: Developed machine learning models for predictive analytics with 85%+ accuracy
Performed exploratory data analysis on large-scale datasets using Python and R
Built data pipelines for automated feature engineering and model training
Presented research findings to academic peers and industry professionals
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on data-driven projects

experience.title: Software Engineer (Data Focus)
experience.description: Applied data science techniques to optimize business processes and customer analytics.
highlights: Built predictive models for customer churn reduction, improving retention by 25%
Developed automated reporting dashboards using Python and data visualization tools
Performed statistical analysis on customer behavior patterns and sales metrics
Implemented data-driven solutions that reduced operational costs by 20%
Created ETL pipelines for processing and analyzing customer data

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction Model
projects.description: Built ML model to predict customer churn with 88% accuracy.
projects.details: Utilized Random Forest and XGBoost algorithms with feature engineering to identify at-risk customers. Deployed model in production environment with automated retraining pipeline.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis Pipeline
projects.description: Developed NLP pipeline for analyzing customer feedback sentiment.
projects.details: Processed 100K+ customer reviews using BERT and transformer models. Built real-time dashboard for sentiment tracking and trend analysis.

projects.title: Sales Forecasting System
projects.description: Time series forecasting model for revenue prediction.
projects.details: Implemented ARIMA and LSTM models to forecast sales with 90% accuracy. Integrated with business intelligence tools for automated reporting.

projects.title: Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Collaborative filtering system for product recommendations.
projects.details: Built hybrid recommendation system combining content-based and collaborative filtering approaches. Increased cross-sell by 30%.
